sentences.en: Contrary to the popular myth, women are not reckless spendthrifts.
sentences.cn: 和人们的普遍观念恰恰相反，女性并不是胡乱挥霍者。

sentences.en: He dashed out, reckless of the danger.
He had a reckless, self-destructive streak.
sentences.cn: 他生性鲁莽草率，会做出自毁行为。

sentences.en: He is very reckless when he is drunk.
He ran into the burning house with reckless abandon (= without caring about the danger ) .
sentences.cn: 他不顾危险冲入着火的房子里。

sentences.en: He showed a reckless disregard for his own safety.
sentences.cn: 他对个人安危全然无所顾忌。

sentences.en: He thought she was too reckless at it.
sentences.cn: 他觉得她对它太粗心大意了.

sentences.en: He was accused of causing death by reckless driving .
sentences.cn: 他被控因鲁莽驾驶致人死亡。

sentences.en: He was so vain and reckless that he would break a friendship, rather than not break a jest.
sentences.cn: 他是如此虚荣狂妄,宁可和人翻脸, 有笑话却不能不说.

sentences.en: Jensen is a dangerous man, and can be very brutal and reckless.
sentences.cn: 詹森是个危险人物，可能会变得非常野蛮而凶残。

sentences.en: Many people believe reckless drivers are treated too leniently.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为对鲁莽驾驶的司机处罚过轻。

sentences.en: Most southern towns have suffered from the reckless depredation of the armed gang.
sentences.cn: 大多数南方城镇都遭受过这帮武装匪徒的鲁蛮掠夺.

sentences.en: Reckless driving may even cost your life.
sentences.cn: 乱开车甚至会使你送命.

sentences.en: She loved to ride; on horseback, she was reckless and utterly without fear.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢骑马；在马背上，她纵横驰骋，毫无畏惧。

sentences.en: The policeman chewed out the driver for reckless driving.
sentences.cn: 那位司机因为开车莽撞,被警察狠狠批评了一顿.

sentences.en: The rap against Conn was that he was far too reckless.
sentences.cn: 科恩被人们认为做事太不计后果。

words.tran_cn: 鲁莽；轻率；不顾一切，不顾后果

trans.tran_cn: 鲁莽的，不顾危险的，粗心大意的，满不在乎的，胆大妄为
trans.tran_en: not caring or worrying about the possible bad or dangerous results of your actions
